item.description:
We have 5 tickets left for this show in the CT Theatre Group section, please get your tickets today before we sell out!

Get your ticket online at www.CTTheatreGroup.org or call (860) 436-9449

CT Theatre Group Update-


Tickets for Neil Simon's Proposals May 30 at the Park Road Playhouse are selling fast!

We have a limited amount of seats in the CT Theatre Group section, so get your ticket today.

Park Road Playhouse had just been voted the Hartford area's favorite Theatre in Hartford Magazine for their excellent productions!

Tickets in the CT Theatre Group section are available at our group discount for only $22 at www.CTTheatreGroup.org

Meet the host of Spotlight on Connecticut Ginny Wolf (www.SpotlightonCT.com) and listen to her interview with Howard Hirsch from Park Road Playhouse , as they talk about Neil Simon's Proposals and Theatre in Connecticut.

Enjoy great Theatre with other Arts and Theatre fans in the CT Theatre Group!

For more info, visit www.CTTheatreGroup.org or call (860) 436-9449

CT Theatre Group - Always a Great Night Out!



Congratulations to Park Road Playhouse -Hartford Magazine's Reader Poll Winner For BEST Theatre!


Join the CT Theatre Group for Neil Simon's Proposals at The Park Road Playhouse


t's a summer of romantic entanglements, which intertwine nine characters' lives on one idyllic afternoon. Clemma, the family's housekeeper (and the story's narrator), dreads a visit from the husband who deserted her years before. Burt Hines, a recovering workaholic convalescing from a second heart attack, looks forward to the arrival of the ex-wife he still loves.

Burt's daughter Josie has just broken her engagement to an intense Harvard law student, and she pines for his buddy Ray, an aspiring writer with whom she once had a brief fling. Ray shows up with a strikingly dim-witted model on his arm, and a young Miami gangster with a gift for malapropisms brings comic hilarity to the gathering

Meet the CT Theatre Group before the show at 7:30 - stay tuned for the after-show event

Enjoy our Group Discount on tickets, Get your seat now before we sell out again!

To purchase 2 tickets, change the purchase amount to $46

To purchase 3 tickets, change the purchase amount to $69

To purchase 4 tickets, change the purchase amount to $92

Listen To The Park Road Playhouse Interview At: http://www.Spotlighto...


For more info, visit www.CTTheatreGroup.com or call (860) 436-9449
item.how_to_find_us: Meet the CT Theatre Group in the lobby at 7:30 before the show

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: We have 6 tickets left for this Sold Out show, get your ticket today!
